type.name: section
type.title: Pension of the President.
type.context: PENSIONS (PRESIDENT) ACT under Pension of the President. 2.  The Presidents Pension shall be seven- eighths of the annual salary of the President in office and shall continue as seven-eighths of such annual salary of each of his successors.
type.description: The Presidents Pension shall be seven- eighths of the annual salary of the President in office and shall continue as seven-eighths of such annual salary of each of his successors.

type.name: section
type.title: President's widow's pension.
type.context: PENSIONS (PRESIDENT) ACT under President's widow's pension. 3.  Where a person dies while he is President or while he is to receive the President's pension and he leaves a widow, the widow shall be paid a pension at an annual rate equivalent to one half of the President's pension.
type.description: Where a person dies while he is President or while he is to receive the President's pension and he leaves a widow, the widow shall be paid a pension at an annual rate equivalent to one half of the President's pension.
